scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.security:scan: npm run security:snyk && npm run security:audit
scripts.security:snyk: cd backend && npx snyk test --severity-threshold=high && cd ../frontend && npx snyk test --severity-threshold=high
scripts.security:audit: cd backend && npm audit --audit-level=high && cd ../frontend && npm audit --audit-level=high
scripts.security:container: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src aquasecurity/trivy config --format table --output trivy-results.txt .
scripts.security:full: npm run security:scan && npm run security:container
scripts.security:zap: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/zap/wrk:rw -t owasp/zap2docker-stable zap-baseline.py -t http://localhost:3000 -r zap-report.html
